Summary: 5 silent triangles not high enough to be planes..creepy
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in New Hamburg
There were no other sightings in New Hamburg on or around May 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in my backyard facing west and from behind the tree that was blocking our view we saw 5-6 grey-ish objects flying silently through the sky. At first I thought they were geese??..lol realizing not at night and no flapping wings they def. weren't geese. They went from south to north fast, smooth and quite. If i had to say what they looked like i would say boeings prototype x-45c. my wife and i were confused and amazed...what the hell was that...we kept saying.
